sheets.title: Read me first
formulas: GENERAL GUIDANCE ON UPDATING THE SIA PREPAREDNESS DASHBOARD

GPEI Coordinator, working closely with National EOC, is responsible for ensuring the use and on-time completion of harmonized preparedness tools at all time points \u2013 District Self-Assessment and Supervisory Validation

Data Working Group reviews preparedness tools and flags preparedness gaps to RRT and OPRTT (if there is a data or technical working group for data in the country, they should flag gaps to the national EOC)
Core indicators for financing, microplanning, and training will be given extra weight in dashboard reviewttt
RRT and OPRTT members lead follow-up with GPEI coordinator to determine best course of action
GPEI Coordinator to work with EPI manager and partners in country to address the gaps in preparedness, including postponing campaign if required, reporting back to RRT Coordinator and OPRTT
In Each sheet there is a countdown of the number of days remaining to the start of the campaign.
Indicators to be filled in by the National level team following the meetings at the Polio Control Room to discuss the status 55tt
Each Region/Province implementing will have its own sheettt
